quotes: "Oglaf meets Terry Pratchett." - Wayne Kerr, The Gooner Gazette
"Forget Shakespeare! Forget the Western Canon! All you need is Smackett." - Harold Coom, author of How to Breed and Why
"I may never finish A Game of Tomes, but I always finish when I read Smackett." - George R.R. Phartin

"Smackett contains multitudes: slapstick farce, deranged erotica, heartfelt paeans to the human spirit. He is clearly possessed by that 10,000 year old demon named Legion." - Father Benny Dict, Diocesan Exorcist
